regulation: Protection of Personal Information Act (POPIA), Act 4 of 2013

maximum_penalties.both: Fine AND imprisonment possible for serious breaches

eight_conditions_for_lawful_processing.requirement: Responsible party must ensure compliance with all POPIA conditions
eight_conditions_for_lawful_processing.implementation: Appoint Information Officer, document compliance measures

eight_conditions_for_lawful_processing.requirement: Personal information must be processed lawfully and in a reasonable manner
eight_conditions_for_lawful_processing.implementation: Obtain explicit consent, document legal basis for each processing activity

eight_conditions_for_lawful_processing.requirement: Must collect for specific, explicitly defined, lawful purpose
eight_conditions_for_lawful_processing.implementation: Privacy notice clearly stating purpose, no secondary use without new consent

eight_conditions_for_lawful_processing.requirement: No processing beyond original purpose without consent
eight_conditions_for_lawful_processing.implementation: Document all processing activities, obtain fresh consent for new purposes

eight_conditions_for_lawful_processing.requirement: Information must be complete, accurate, not misleading, updated where necessary
eight_conditions_for_lawful_processing.implementation: Regular data quality audits, data subject access to update records

eight_conditions_for_lawful_processing.requirement: Data subject must be notified about collection, purpose, recipient, and rights
eight_conditions_for_lawful_processing.implementation: Comprehensive privacy policy, clear notices at point of collection

eight_conditions_for_lawful_processing.requirement: Secure personal information against loss, damage, unauthorized access
eight_conditions_for_lawful_processing.implementation: Encryption, access controls, audit logs, incident response plan

eight_conditions_for_lawful_processing.requirement: Data subjects have right to access, correct, and object to processing
eight_conditions_for_lawful_processing.implementation: Formal process for data subject requests, respond within 30 days

data_breach_notification.regulator_notification: As soon as reasonably possible after becoming aware
data_breach_notification.data_subject_notification: Required if breach poses risk to rights and freedoms

consent_requirements.withdrawal: Must be as easy to withdraw as to give consent
consent_requirements.children: Parental consent required for children under 18

special_personal_information.additional_requirements: Explicit consent OR specific POPIA exemption required

vaal_ai_empire_compliance_checklist.evidence: Written appointment letter, published on website
Accessible on website, covers all 8 conditions
Checkbox on payment form, consent logged in database
MongoDB encryption enabled, payment data tokenized (Stripe)
Payment data: 5 years (FICA), user data: deleted upon request

vaal_ai_empire_compliance_checklist.status: Required for Stripe, MongoDB Atlas, SendGrid
